评论详情: Wore this dress to a wedding. The dress was perfect. I'm 5'5 and 165 and I got the XL because I'm a little heavy on top. I like the adjustable shoulder straps. Fabric is flowy and comfortable. Color is exactly as pictured. A few loose strings that I snipped but no unraveling. Very happy with this purchase.
Lo utilizaré para evento especial próximo sábado, me siento como muñeca hermosa 💖,  cuando me lo provee Amor.

评论详情: I received my order today and I try and perfectly fit on me but the problem is the left side is broken.
Classic vintage style. Adjustable shoulder straps. Long. Flowing. Embroidery is delicate
This is not what I expected. And 2). It's not T length or light material for a day wedding. 3) The size is not true to size

I thought it would feel cheap, but it's beautiful and fits very nice.  Make sure to check your size rather than go with Amazon suggested size.  Also this is a long gown, not a cocktail dress (I may have missed that small detail when I ordered it, lol)
Beautiful dress. Wore to my grand-daughter wedding. Loved the tea length. Perfect fit and I got many compliments on this dress. Good quality. Packed well for travel.
